question: Who among the following Kings of Rajasthan was a victim of Patricide?
explanation: Rana KumbhaÂ was killed by his son Udai Singh I in 1468. However, Uday Singh died or murdered in 1473 and was succeeded by his brother Raimal. Raimal was later succeeded by his son Sangram Singh or Rana Sanga. Thus, Rana Sanga was grandson of Rana Kumbha.
